channel.title: Command Line on My Homelab Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Command Line on My Homelab Notes

item.title: Tar
item.description: There are many option to using this powerful archiving command, but this is all about keeping it simple. Only the most common usage examples will be demonstrated. Creating a tar archive Bellow are 2 examples of zipping up an directory, and another of a bunch of files. tar cvzf nginxRTD.tar.gz ./nginx tar cvzf archive.tar.gz *.jpg c create v show output to screen z compress using gzip f filename or archive name Extracting a tar archive The will extract the archive in the current working directory
